title: Script style font closest to this? Script Id Guide NOT working right now..
content:
Any Suggestions to something close to this would be appriciated. Thank you

author: amiart

comments.content: Have a browse through [MyFonts script collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123212/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/category/myfonts/script/) and see if anything jumps out at you — I found many that have some of the characteristics contained here....
